item.title: Preparing the Way of the Lord in the Wilderness: Luke 3:1-6
item.description: I’d like to pray this week’s collect again: Merciful God, who sent your messengers the prophets to preach repentance and prepare the way for our salvation: Give us grace to heed their warnings and forsake our sins, that we may greet with joy the coming of Jesus Christ our Redeemer; who lives and reigns with you and the Holy Spirit, one God, now and forever. Amen. Introduction It’s been a particularly difficult week here at Church of the Savior.
